Speaker: speaker1
Response: I hear that you've been to the Saikei Ski Resort for the weekend . Did you enjoy it ?

Speaker: speaker2
Response: Yes , it's so exciting , though I had the most falls in our skiing team .

Speaker: speaker1
Response: Isn't there any coach to teach you how to ski ?

Speaker: speaker2
Response: Of course there is . The top-level coaches there are from the State Sports General Administration .

Speaker: speaker2
Response: Yes.My face even ached in the icy wind .

Speaker: speaker2
Response: I was skiing on and on excitedly until I realized one thing-I could not stop ! You can just imagine how terrified I was .
